alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Lagrange; Noble; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Steuben; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 28 at 11:25AM EDT until July 29 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT /11 PM CDT/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 100. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana, southwest Michigan and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...Until midnight EDT /11 PM CDT/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing when possible. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: De Kalb; Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Lagrange; Noble; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Steuben; Western St. Joseph
